name: dom-walk
readme:
# dom-walk [![build status][1]][2]

iteratively walk a DOM node

## Example

``` js
var walk = require("dom-walk")

walk(document.body.childNodes, function (node) {
    console.log("node", node)
})
```

## Installation

`npm install dom-walk`

## Tests

`make test`

## Contributors

 - Raynos
